resources.string: This app records you phone\'s screen to detect advertisement content served to you within your Meta Facebook app.
This app records you device\'s screen to detect advertisement content served to you within your Meta Facebook and Instagram apps.
To begin detecting advertisements, you will need to register. This can be done below:
When the switch above is flipped on, this app will detect advertisements.
To learn more about our research project, you can visit the official ADM+S Australian Mobile Ad Observatory website, by clicking here
When active, your screen is being recorded.
